C

calculateConnectedMass(int[][], int[]) - Static method in class image.Processing
Will calculate the masses of all the connected blobs, setting the mass of the lowest blob number (base blob) to the total mass of all the connected blobs combined This will also set the mass of the all the blobs connected to this blob to be 0, i.e.
calculateTempArray(int[], int, int[][]) - Static method in class image.Processing
Will update currentBlobArray with any values that it finds in connectedBlobs[j] that are not yet in currentBlobArray
checkConnected(int, int, int[][]) - Static method in class image.Processing
This method will check if the 2 blobnumbers are already connected.
checkPos(int, int, BufferedImage) - Static method in class image.Processing
This will check if a certain place is white
colorFilter(BufferedImage, String) - Static method in class image.Processing
This method does the color filtering
comparativeFilter(BufferedImage, String) - Static method in class image.Processing
This method will compare the difference in values from the rgb values, this in order to get to a better result than a direct filter would do
copyImage(BufferedImage) - Static method in class image.Processing
This method is in order to get a second bufferedImage, this because just making a new bufferedImage and doing new = old then the new one will actually just point to the old one instead of making a complete new object.
cutimage(BufferedImage, int, int, int, int) - Static method in class image.Processing
Cuts an image out of the original image and returns that
